T02D1646:309a-0: @309a * // he ru ka phyag rgya gcig pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
T02D1646:309a-2: # // dang po snga bar langs la /
T02D1646:309a-3: phyi nang gi sgo sbyang bar bya /
T02D1646:309a-4: de nas mandala dang mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams /
T02D1646:309a-5: de nas bdag nyid kyis snying gar zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1646:309a-6: 'khor gyi steng du yi ge hr'i: mthing gcig bsgoms
T02D1646:309a-7: la / de las 'od zer 'phros pas bla ma
T02D1646:309a-8: dang bcas pa'i ye shes kyi lha mdun gyi nam
T02D1646:309a-10: gong ma'i mchod pa rnams yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la dbul /
T02D1646:309a-11: de nas yan lag bdun pa'i mchod pa bya /
T02D1646:309a-12: de nas yi ge brgya pas bzod gsol byas la mi dmigs par bsgoms /
T02D1646:309a-13: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1646:309a-14: zhes brjod pas stong pa nyid du bsgom /
T02D1646:309a-15: de'i ngang las yi ge h'um gi snang ba las ra ba dang /
T02D1646:309a-16: dra ba dang sa gzhi ste /
T02D1646:309a-17: srung ba'i 'khor lo gzhung bzhin du bsgom /
T02D1646:309a-18: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i nang du padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa gcig bsgom /
T02D1646:309a-19: de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge hr'i: mthing gcig bsgom /
T02D1646:309a-20: de rnams gyur pa las phyag mtshan kha tv'am gcig
T02D1646:309a-21: tu bsgom de gnas skabs gyur pa las dpal rdo
T02D1646:309a-22: rje nye ru ka sku mdog mthing ga phyag bzhi
T02D1646:309a-23: pa zhal bzhi pa zhabs gnyis pa /
T02D1646:309a-24: phyag g-yas na mda' rang thod pa /
T02D1646:309a-25: g-yon na gzhu dang kha tv'am ga bsnams pa /
T02D1646:309a-26: dbu la mi bskyod pas brgyan pa /
T02D1646:309a-27: thod pa skam po'i cod pan can /
T02D1646:309a-28: thod pa rlon pa'i do shal gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1646:309a-29: 'od zer dmar smug gi nang na bzhugs pa cig bsgoms la /
T02D1646:309a-30: de'i snying gar zla ba'i steng du sa bon hr'i: yig sngon po cig bsgom /
T02D1646:309a-31: de las 'od 'phros pas ye shes kyi dpal he
T02D1646:309a-32: ru ka mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la
T02D1646:309b-2: gus pas khyod la bdag gsol 'debs //
T02D1646:309b-3: rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag sgrubs shig / ces brjod la /
T02D1646:309b-4: mchod pa dngos su 'byor na dbul /
T02D1646:309b-5: ma 'byor na yid las byung ba'i mchod pas mchod /
T02D1646:309b-7: mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che //
T02D1646:309b-8: sngags kyi me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D1646:309b-9: sha chen rtag tu gsol mdzad pa'i //
T02D1646:309b-11: de nas de nyid 'od du zhu ste /
T02D1646:309b-12: bdag nyid la thim par bsams la /
T02D1646:309b-13: de nas snying ga'i hr'i: las sems gtad de /
T02D1646:309b-16: aom a'a hr'i: h'um zhes bzlas ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D1646:309b-17: thun gtong ba'i dus su ye shes kyi lha yid
T02D1646:309b-19: dam tshig gi lha ni mi dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1646:309b-20: thun la 'jug pa'i dus su skad cig mas lhar bskyed la /
T02D1646:309b-21: sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi lha spyan drangs la /
T02D1646:309b-22: bstims nas snga ma ltar bsgom /
